nodes.description: 三个自杀式炸弹袭击者在尼日利亚东北部引爆了爆炸物，造成30人死亡，39人受伤。
nodes.support_text: Lagos, Nigeria (CNN) Three suicide bombers, two girls and a boy, killed 30 people and injured 39 others when they detonated explosives in Nigeria's northeast, emergency response officials said on Monday.

nodes.description: 一名炸弹袭击者在Konduga小镇的影院外引爆了爆炸物，当时那里聚集了许多观看足球比赛的球迷。
nodes.support_text: One of the bombers, detonated his explosive outside a cinema hall where soccer fans had gathered to watch a match on Sunday night in Konduga, a remote town in Borno State.

nodes.description: 两名年龄不明的女孩在距离影院几公里处自爆，导致另外六人死亡，17人受伤。
nodes.support_text: A few kilometers from the hall, the girls, whose ages are unknown, blew themselves up and killed another six people and injured 17 others.

nodes.description: 至少24人死亡，信息来源为Bello Dambatta，州紧急救援行动负责人。
nodes.support_text: At least 24 people died according to Bello Dambatta, head of the rescue team of State emergency operations.

nodes.description: 袭击者位于同一区域的不同位置，大部分遇难者来自观景中心。
nodes.support_text: They positioned themselves in different spots in the same area. Most of the people who died were from the viewing center.

nodes.description: 袭击导致至少24人死亡，21人受伤，信息来源为Bello Dambatta。
nodes.support_text: At least 24 people died when he blew himself up and 21 people were injured, Dambatta told CNN.
